amendment.description: Amendment expresses the sense of Congress that the President and Secretary of State should use all means to support the government of Paraguay to reform its practices and laws regarding international adoptions.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 5 in House Rept. 105-184, to express that it is the sense of Congress that the Administration should use all means to encourage and support the government of Paraguay to reform its practices and laws regarding international adoptions.

vote.text: On agreeing to the McGovern amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.
